events.text:
[i]None of the other shapes like me…[/i]
[i]I don’t fit in anywhere.[/i]
[i]I couldn't roll…[/i]
[i]I literally didn't fit in with the squares… [/i]
[i]Didn't manage to jump like the triangles…[/i]
As you start to leave the party moving towards the exit. You see OoOOo roll towards you.
Hey [pn], wait! How are you doing? I heard you couldn't really fit in with the shape games.

uuuhhh, yah. I couldn't.
I am just too different.
Whaaat! I heard everyone really liked you! Willing to try their games even if you are different.

Really? 
The other shapes liked me?
Ofcourse! [pn] you are great! Some of us wish to be like you, so daring to mingle.
So stay a bit longer and join us on the dance floor.

And so [pn] the [ps] realized that they were part of the party all along. And all the shapes had a great and fun night dancing!
Even if all the shapes are different, different shapes can still fit together.
